name: Festival of Life
description:
You are a psychic biographer, communing with the deceased to help explore and document their memories. You will drop dice along a timeline of their life, and draw cards to select writing prompts, generating memories that connect together and paint a picture of a life, and how earlier events influenced events later in life.

Suitable for one or more players, together.

Created by Jarrod Farquhar-Nicol & Sean Fenemore.
